projectExperiences.description:
A platform which holds your username and passwords for different social media stuffs |A platform which holds your username and passwords for different social media stuffs |

    

        Screenshot 2024-04-01 140847.pngScreenshot 2024-04-01 140847.png

This project is a backend implementation of social authentication using OAuth. It allows users to log in via third-party providers such as Google, LinkedIn etc. Built with Node.js, Bcrypt.js, JWT , Passport.js it ensures secure authentication and easy integration with frontend applications.This project is a backend implementation of social authentication using OAuth. It allows users to log in via third-party providers such as Google, LinkedIn etc. Built with Node.js, Bcrypt.js, JWT , Passport.js it ensures secure authentication and easy integration with frontend applications.
